name: weather
trans: n. 天气；气象；气候；处境
vt. 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打
vi. 风化；受侵蚀；经受风雨

sentences.english: What’s the weather like today?
sentences.chinese: 今天天气如何？

sentences.english: The weather turned bitterly cold.
sentences.chinese: 天气变得很冷了。

detailed_translations.english: the temperature and other conditions such as sun, rain, and wind

detailed_translations.chinese: 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打
detailed_translations.english: if rock, wood, or someone’s face is weathered by the wind, sun, rain etc, or if it weathers, it changes colour or shape over a period of time

name: like
trans: n. 爱好；同样的人或物

sentences.english: I like your jacket.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢你这件上衣。

sentences.english: I don’t really like classical music.
sentences.chinese: 我不是很喜欢古典音乐。

sentences.english: Do you like this colour?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢这种颜色吗？

sentences.english: I like my coffee quite weak.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢喝很淡的咖啡。

sentences.english: I don’t like it when you get angry.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢你生气时的样子。

sentences.english: How do you like living in London (= how much do you like it )?
sentences.chinese: 住在伦敦你感觉怎样？

sentences.english: I quite like their new album.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢他们的新专辑。

sentences.english: We really liked the film.
sentences.chinese: 我们非常喜欢这部影片。

sentences.english: The time I like best (= like most of all ) is the evening when it’s cool.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的时间是凉爽的傍晚。

sentences.english: I didn’t like the idea of being a single parent.
sentences.chinese: 我可不想当单亲家长。

sentences.english: Would you like a drink?
sentences.chinese: 你想喝一杯吗？

detailed_translations.english: to enjoy something or think that it is nice or good

name: sunny
trans: adj. 阳光充足的，和煦的；快活的；性情开朗的

sentences.english: a warm sunny day
sentences.chinese: 温暖晴朗的一天

sentences.english: a sunny morning
sentences.chinese: 艳阳高照的上午

sentences.english: a nice sunny room
sentences.chinese: 阳光充足的房间

sentences.english: I hope it’s sunny tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我希望明天天晴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 阳光充足的，和煦的；快活的；性情开朗的
detailed_translations.english: having a lot of light from the sun

name: windy
trans: adj. 多风的，有风的；腹胀的；吹牛的

sentences.english: It’s too windy for a picnic.
sentences.chinese: 风太大，不适合野餐。

sentences.english: a cold, windy day
sentences.chinese: 一个寒冷的大风天

sentences.english: a windy hillside
sentences.chinese: 当风的山坡

detailed_translations.chinese: 多风的，有风的；腹胀的；吹牛的
detailed_translations.english: if it is windy, there is a lot of wind

name: take
trans: vt. 拿，取；采取；接受（礼物等）；买，花费；耗费（时间等）
n. 捕获量；看法；利益，盈益；（入场券的）售得金额

sentences.english: Will you take the job?
sentences.chinese: 你接受这份工作吗？

sentences.english: Do you take American Express?
sentences.chinese: 你们接受美国运通信用卡吗？

sentences.english: If you take my advice , you’ll see a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 如果你听我的意见，就去看医生。

sentences.english: Our helpline take s 3.5 million calls (= telephone calls ) a year.
sentences.chinese: 我们的求助热线每年接听350万个电话。

sentences.english: Some doctors are unwilling to take new patients without a referral.
sentences.chinese: 有些医生不愿意接收没有转诊单的新病人。

sentences.english: Liz found his criticisms hard to take .
sentences.chinese: 利兹觉得他的批评很难接受。

sentences.english: I just can’t take any more (= can’t deal with a bad situation any longer ) .
sentences.chinese: 我再也受不了了。

sentences.english: Staff have agreed to take a 2% pay cut.
sentences.chinese: 员工同意接受2%的降薪。

detailed_translations.chinese: 拿走； 接受， 接纳
detailed_translations.english: to accept or choose something that is offered, suggested, or given to you

name: cap
trans: vt. 覆盖；胜过；给…戴帽；加盖于

sentences.english: a baseball cap
sentences.chinese: 棒球帽

sentences.english: a bottle cap
sentences.chinese: 瓶盖

sentences.english: a graceful tower capped with a golden dome
sentences.chinese: 一座漂亮的金色圆顶塔

detailed_translations.english: a type of flat hat that has a curved part sticking out at the front, and is often worn as part of a uniform
to have a particular substance on top

sentences.english: He sprang up from the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 他从沙发上猛然跳了起来。

sentences.english: She spread a sheet on the sofa for me.
sentences.chinese: 她为我在沙发上铺了一条单子。

sentences.english: There's enough space to have a sofa there.
sentences.chinese: 那里还有足够的地方放下一个沙发。

detailed_translations.english: a comfortable seat with raised arms and a back, that is wide enough for two or three people to sit on

sentences.english: We moved to Center Street when I was young.
sentences.chinese: 在我小时候，我们搬到了中心大街。

sentences.english: She lives just a few streets away.
sentences.chinese: 她的住处就在几条街外。

sentences.english: I walked on further down the street .
sentences.chinese: 我继续沿着马路走。

sentences.english: Someone just moved in across the street .
sentences.chinese: 街对面有人刚刚搬进来。

sentences.english: a car parked on the other side of the street
sentences.chinese: 停在街对面的一辆车

detailed_translations.english: a public road in a city or town that has houses, shops etc on one or both sides

name: rain
trans: vt. 大量地给；使大量落下

sentences.english: a night of wind and rain
sentences.chinese: 风雨交加的夜晚

sentences.english: There will be heavy rain in most parts of the country.
sentences.chinese: 全国大部分地区将有大雨。

sentences.english: Outside it was still raining.
sentences.chinese: 外面仍在下雨。

detailed_translations.english: water that falls in small drops from clouds in the sky
if it rains, drops of water fall from clouds in the sky

name: snow
trans: vt. 使纷纷落下；使变白

sentences.english: Snow was falling heavily as we entered the village.
sentences.chinese: 我们进村的时候雪下得正大。

sentences.english: I could see footprints in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 我看到雪地里有脚印。

sentences.english: The town was buried under three feet of snow.
sentences.chinese: 小镇被三英尺厚的积雪覆盖着。

detailed_translations.english: soft white pieces of frozen water that fall from the sky in cold weather and cover the ground
if it snows, snow falls from the sky

sentences.english: ski slopes
sentences.chinese: 滑雪坡

sentences.english: a ski resort (= where people can go skiing )
sentences.chinese: 滑雪度假胜地

sentences.english: ...the Swiss ski resort of Klosters.
sentences.chinese: …瑞士的克洛斯特斯滑雪胜地。

sentences.english: ...a private ski instructor.
sentences.chinese: …一位私人滑雪教练。

detailed_translations.english: one of a pair of long thin narrow pieces of wood or plastic that you fasten to your boots and use for moving on snow or on water
to move on skis for sport or in order to travel on snow or water
You use ski to refer to things that are concerned with skiing

name: radio
trans: n. 收音机；无线电广播设备
vi. 用无线电进行通信

sentences.english: We’ve lost radio contact with the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我们和这架飞机失去了无线电联络。

sentences.english: I sat down and turned on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 我坐下来打开收音机。

detailed_translations.english: when messages are sent or received in this way

sentences.english: Can you take a photo of me and Rachel?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我和雷切尔拍张照吗？

detailed_translations.english: a photograph

sentences.english: She had read about it in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 关于这件事她已经在报纸上看到了。

sentences.english: a series of newspaper articles about life in Cuba
sentences.chinese: 刊登在报纸上的一系列关于古巴生活的文章

detailed_translations.english: a set of large folded sheets of printed paper containing news, articles, pictures, advertisements etc which is sold daily or weekly

name: little
trans: adj. 小的；很少的；短暂的；小巧可爱的
n. 少许；没有多少；短时间

sentences.english: a little house
sentences.chinese: 小屋

sentences.english: a cake decorated with little flowers
sentences.chinese: 点缀着小花的蛋糕

sentences.english: She was cutting the meat up into little bits.
sentences.chinese: 她把肉切成小丁。

sentences.english: Let me tell you a little bit about myself.
sentences.chinese: 我来给你稍微讲讲我自己吧。

sentences.english: We didn’t have toys like this when I was little.
sentences.chinese: 在我小时候，我们没有这样的玩具。

detailed_translations.english: small in size

sentences.english: Her grandmother lent her a camera for a school trip to Venice and Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 她的祖母借给她一部相机，让她在学校组织的到威尼斯和埃及的旅行中使用。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment used to take photographs or make films or television programmes

sentences.english: her smiling face
sentences.chinese: 她的笑脸

detailed_translations.english: to make your mouth curve upwards, in order to be friendly or because you are happy or amused
an expression in which your mouth curves upwards, when you are being friendly or are happy or amused

sentences.english: Katie had drawn a cottage with a little stream running next to it.
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂画了一间小茅舍，旁边流淌着一条小溪。

sentences.english: She asked the little girl to draw a picture of the man she’d spoken to.
sentences.chinese: 她让小女孩把刚才和她说话的那个男人画出来。

sentences.english: Keith was drawing a complicated-looking graph.
sentences.chinese: 基思在画一张看上去很复杂的图表。

sentences.english: I’ve never been able to draw very well.
sentences.chinese: 我从来就画不好图画。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a picture of something using a pencil, pen etc

name: picture
trans: n. 照片，图画；影片；景色；化身

sentences.english: The room had several pictures on the walls.
sentences.chinese: 那个房间墙上有几幅画。

sentences.english: a book with pictures in it
sentences.chinese: 带插图的书

sentences.english: He asked her permission to paint her picture (= paint a picture of her ) .
sentences.chinese: 他请求她允许为她画像。

detailed_translations.english: shapes, lines etc painted or drawn on a surface, showing what someone or something looks like
to show someone or something in a photograph, painting, or drawing

name: write
trans: vi. 写，写字；写作，作曲；写信
vt. 写，书写；写信给；著述

sentences.english: I wrote her several letters , but she didn’t reply.
sentences.chinese: 我给她写了几封信，可是她没有回复。

detailed_translations.english: to put words in a letter to someone

name: letter
trans: n. 信；字母，文字；证书；文学，学问；字面意义

sentences.english: I got a letter from Melanie today.
sentences.chinese: 今天我收到梅拉妮的一封信。

sentences.english: There are 26 letters in the English alphabet.
sentences.chinese: 英语字母表有26个字母。

detailed_translations.english: a written or printed message that is usually put in an envelope and sent by mail

name: colour
trans: n. 颜色；风格；气色，面色；外貌
vt. 把…涂颜色，粉饰；歪曲；使脸红

sentences.english: Her eyes suddenly met his and she coloured slightly.
sentences.chinese: 她的目光突然和他相遇，她微微有点脸红了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…涂颜色，粉饰；歪曲；使脸红
detailed_translations.english: when someone colours, their face becomes redder because they are embarrassed

detailed_translations.chinese: 颜色；风格；气色，面色；外貌
detailed_translations.english: red, blue, yellow, green, brown, purple etc

sentences.english: a tidy desk
sentences.chinese: 整洁的书桌

sentences.english: I try to keep the garden tidy .
sentences.chinese: 我尽量保持花园整洁。

sentences.english: Ellen’s room is always neat and tidy .
sentences.chinese: 埃伦的房间总是非常整洁。

detailed_translations.english: a room, house, desk etc that is tidy is neatly arranged with everything in the right place
to make a place look tidy

name: room
trans: n. 房间；空间；余地；机会；房间里所有的人
vt. 为…提供住处；租房，合住；投宿，住宿；留…住宿

sentences.english: I looked around the room.
sentences.chinese: 我四下看了看房间。

sentences.english: She nodded toward a man who was standing across the room (= on the other side of the room ) .
sentences.chinese: 她朝站在屋子另一头的一个男人点点头。

sentences.english: Someone was laughing in the next room (= the one beside the one you are in ) .
sentences.chinese: 隔壁房间有人在笑。

sentences.english: Here’s your key - room 348.
sentences.chinese: 这是你的钥匙——348号房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 房间；空间；余地；机会；房间里所有的人
detailed_translations.english: a part of the inside of a building that has its own walls, floor, and ceiling

detailed_translations.chinese: 为…提供住处；租房，合住；投宿，住宿；留…住宿
detailed_translations.english: to rent and live in a room somewhere

name: do
trans: n. 要求；规定；C大调音阶中的第一音
v. 做；干；学习；研究；进行；完成；解答；整理；算出；引起；行过
aux. 助动词（构成疑问句和否定句）；（代替动词）；（用于加强语气）
n. （口语）事件；（主英国口语）诈骗；（主英国、新西兰口语）宴会；（口语）必须做到的事情

sentences.english: ‘Will Kay come?’ ‘She may do.’
sentences.chinese: “凯来吗？” “或许吧。”

sentences.english: So now you know as much as I do.
sentences.chinese: 那么现在你知道的和我一样多了。

sentences.english: ‘You forgot all about it.’ ‘No, I didn’t.’
sentences.chinese: “你把这事忘记得一干二净。” “没有，我没忘记。”

sentences.english: ‘I want to go home.’ ‘So do I.’
sentences.chinese: “我想回家。” “我也是。”

sentences.english: I didn’t believe the story and neither did he.
sentences.chinese: 我不相信这个故事，他也不信。

detailed_translations.english: used instead of repeating a verb that has already been used
used instead of repeating a verb that has already been used

name: homework
trans: n. 家庭作业，课外作业

sentences.english: For homework, finish the exercise on page 14.
sentences.chinese: 家庭作业是完成第14页的练习。

detailed_translations.english: work that a student at school is asked to do at home

sentences.english: I usually sleep on my back.
sentences.chinese: 我一般仰卧着睡觉。

sentences.english: Did you sleep well?
sentences.chinese: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.english: He’s lucky because at least he has somewhere to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 他算是幸运的，至少还有个睡觉的地方。

detailed_translations.english: to rest your mind and body, usually at night when you are lying in bed with your eyes closed
the natural state of resting your mind and body, usually at night

sentences.english: I can’t tell you. It’s a secret.
sentences.chinese: 我不能告诉你，这是个秘密。

sentences.english: It was no secret that the two men hated each other.
sentences.chinese: 这两个男人相互仇视，这算不得什么秘密。

sentences.english: Don’t worry. Your secret is safe with me (= I won’t tell anyone about it ) .
sentences.chinese: 别担心，我会替你保守秘密。

sentences.english: Your hair always looks so great – what’s your secret ?
sentences.chinese: 你的头发看起来总是很漂亮——你的秘诀是什么？

sentences.english: They kept their relationship secret from their parents.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩的关系瞒着父母。

detailed_translations.english: something that is kept hidden or that is known about by only a few people
known about by only a few people and kept hidden from others

sentences.english: Employees must show their identity cards at the gate.
sentences.chinese: 雇员在大门口必须出示自己的身份卡。

sentences.english: I haven’t got my membership card yet.
sentences.chinese: 我还没拿到会员卡。

sentences.english: a piece of card
sentences.chinese: 一张卡片纸

sentences.english: My name’s Adam Carver. Here’s my card.
sentences.chinese: 我叫亚当•卡弗，这是我的名片。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of plastic or paper containing information about a person or showing, for example, that they belong to a particular organization, club etc

name: flower
trans: vi. 成熟，发育；开花；繁荣；旺盛

sentences.english: a lovely rose bush with delicate pink flowers
sentences.chinese: 一簇开着娇嫩的粉红色花朵的美丽蔷薇

sentences.english: fields full of beautiful wild flowers
sentences.chinese: 开满美丽野花的田野

sentences.english: It was May, and the apple trees were all in flower.
sentences.chinese: 那是个5月，苹果树开满了花。

detailed_translations.english: a coloured or white part that a plant or tree produces before fruit or seeds

name: science
trans: n. 科学；技术；学科；理科

sentences.english: Many leading scientists do not consider that science can give absolutely reliable knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 许多杰出科学家都不认为科学能够提供绝对可靠的知识。

sentences.english: the founder of modern science, Isaac Newton
sentences.chinese: 现代科学创始人艾萨克·牛顿

sentences.english: developments in science and technology
sentences.chinese: 科学技术的发展

detailed_translations.english: knowledge about the world, especially based on examining, testing, and proving facts

sentences.english: I couldn’t go shopping yesterday so I’ll have to go today.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天没能去买东西，所以今天我必须去。

sentences.english: Ed has his music lesson today.
sentences.chinese: 埃德今天有音乐课。

detailed_translations.english: on the day that is happening now
the day that is happening now

name: call
trans: n. 电话；呼叫；要求；访问

sentences.english: You may call it harmless fun, but I call it pornography.
sentences.chinese: 你可能会说这是无恶意的小玩笑，但是我却认为这是色情。

sentences.english: I heard someone calling in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 我听到远处有人在叫。

detailed_translations.english: to use a word or name to describe someone or something in a particular way

name: noise
trans: n. [环境] 噪音；响声；杂音
vi. 发出声音；大声议论

sentences.english: What’s that noise?
sentences.chinese: 那是什么声音？

sentences.english: Try not to make a noise when you go upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 上楼时尽量不要弄出声。

sentences.english: There was a lot of noise outside.
sentences.chinese: 外面很吵闹。

sentences.english: Noise levels have been reduced by 20%.
sentences.chinese: 噪音水平下降了20%。

detailed_translations.english: a sound, especially one that is loud, unpleasant, or frightening

name: drink
trans: vt. 喝，饮；吸收；举杯庆贺

sentences.english: You should drink plenty of water.
sentences.chinese: 你应该大量喝水。

sentences.english: What would you like to drink?
sentences.chinese: 你想喝点什么？

sentences.english: Take a seat while I get you something to drink .
sentences.chinese: 请坐，我去给你倒杯喝的。

sentences.english: She filled the glass and drank.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子倒满后喝了起来。

detailed_translations.english: to take liquid into your mouth and swallow it
to take liquid into your mouth and swallow it
an amount of liquid that you drink, or the act of drinking something

sentences.english: I could hear Sarah and Andy talking in the next room.
sentences.chinese: 我听到萨拉和安迪在隔壁讲话。

sentences.english: Sue and Bob still aren’t talking (= are refusing to talk to each other ) .
sentences.chinese: 休和鲍勃仍然互不理睬。

detailed_translations.english: to say things to someone as part of a conversation
to say things to someone as part of a conversation

name: stone
trans: n. 石头；结石；[宝] 宝石
vt. 向扔石块；用石头铺

sentences.english: a stone wall
sentences.chinese: 石墙

sentences.english: stone steps
sentences.chinese: 石台阶

sentences.english: The floors are made of stone.
sentences.chinese: 地面是石头铺成的。

detailed_translations.english: a hard solid mineral substance
to throw stones at someone or something

name: five-stones
trans: n. (抛掷五颗小石子的)五子游戏

sentences.english: I turned to speak to the person standing behind me.
sentences.chinese: 我转身和站在我后面的那人说话。

sentences.english: Someone could easily creep up behind us.
sentences.chinese: 很可能有人跟在我们后面。

sentences.english: The car behind was hooting impatiently.
sentences.chinese: 后面那辆车不耐烦地按着喇叭。

sentences.english: Jane shut the door behind her.
sentences.chinese: 简随手关上身后的门。

sentences.english: The manager was sitting behind a large desk.
sentences.chinese: 经理坐在一张大办公桌的后面。

detailed_translations.english: at or towards the back of a thing or person

sentences.english: She keeps a bottle of gin hidden behind a stack of books.
sentences.chinese: 她在一堆书的后面藏了一瓶杜松子酒。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately put or keep something or someone in a place where they cannot easily be seen or found

name: seek
trans: vt. 寻求；寻找；探索；搜索

sentences.english: new graduates seeking employment
sentences.chinese: 正在求职的刚毕业的大学生

sentences.english: Drivers are advised to seek alternative routes.
sentences.chinese: 驾车者被告知需另寻其他路线。

sentences.english: They quickly sought to distance themselves from the protesters.
sentences.chinese: 他们迅速设法远离抗议者。

detailed_translations.english: to look for someone or something

name: skip
trans: vi. 跳跃；跳绳；遗漏；跳读

sentences.english: They saw the man with a little girl skipping along behind him.
sentences.chinese: 他们看到那个男人身后跟着一个蹦蹦跳跳的小女孩。

detailed_translations.english: to go from one subject to another in no fixed order
a skipping movement

sentences.english: Franklin told Howe to hurry up and take his bath; otherwise, they'd miss their train.
sentences.chinese: 富兰克林催豪快点洗澡，要不然他们就赶不上火车了。

detailed_translations.english: If you tell someone to hurry up, you are telling them to do something more quickly than they were doing it

name: late
trans: adj. 晚的；迟的；已故的；最近的

sentences.english: Sorry I’m late – I overslept.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，来晚了——我睡过头了。

sentences.english: The train was even later than usual.
sentences.chinese: 火车到得甚至比平时还晚。

sentences.english: We apologize for the late departure of flight AZ709.
sentences.chinese: 我们为AZ709航班延误起飞表示歉意。

sentences.english: There are penalties if loan repayments are late.
sentences.chinese: 逾期偿还贷款会被处以罚金。

sentences.english: The stores are open later on Thursdays.
sentences.chinese: 商店星期四开门较晚。

detailed_translations.english: arriving, happening, or done after the time that was expected, agreed, or arranged
after the usual time

name: sad
trans: adj. 难过的；悲哀的，令人悲痛的；凄惨的，阴郁的（形容颜色）

sentences.english: The relationship had been important to me and its loss left me feeling sad and empty.
sentences.chinese: 这种关系对我一直都很重要，失去它让我感到难过而空虚。

sentences.english: I'm sad that Julie's marriage is on the verge of splitting up.
sentences.chinese: 我为朱莉的婚姻处于破裂的边缘感到难过。

detailed_translations.english: If you are sad, you feel unhappy, usually because something has happened that you do not like

name: no
trans: abbr. 数字（number）；元素锘（nobelium）的符号

sentences.english: ‘Are you Italian?’ ‘No, I’m Spanish.’
sentences.chinese: “你是意大利人吗？”“不，我是西班牙人。”

sentences.english: ‘Do you want any more?’ ‘No thanks.’
sentences.chinese: “你还要再来点吗？”“不要了，谢谢。”

sentences.english: ‘Could you help me write this?’ ‘No, sorry, I haven’t got time at the moment.’
sentences.chinese: “你能帮我写这个吗？”“抱歉，不行，我现在没时间。”

sentences.english: He wanted to take me to a disco but I said no.
sentences.chinese: 他想带我去迪斯科舞厅，但是我拒绝了。

sentences.english: Sixty percent of people voted no.
sentences.chinese: 60%的人投了反对票。

sentences.english: If you’re asking whether I feel the same way about her, the answer is no.
sentences.chinese: 如果你问的是我对她是否也有相同的感觉，答案是没有。

detailed_translations.english: used to give a negative reply to a question, offer, or request

sentences.english: He dotted down those notes.
sentences.chinese: 他匆匆记下了那些注解。

sentences.english: She ganged up on me with those rough boys.
sentences.chinese: 她伙同那些粗野的男孩对付我。

name: clap
trans: vt. 拍手，鼓掌；轻轻拍打某人
vi. 鼓掌，拍手；啪地关上

sentences.english: One man began to clap, and others joined in.
sentences.chinese: 一个人鼓起了掌，其他人也跟着鼓掌。

sentences.english: The couple were cheered and clapped on their arrival.
sentences.chinese: 这对夫妇抵达时人群为他们欢呼鼓掌。

sentences.english: The audience clapped politely but without much enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 观众礼貌地鼓了掌，但并不热烈。

detailed_translations.english: to hit your hands against each other many times to make a sound that shows your approval, agreement, or enjoyment
the loud sound that you make when you hit your hands together many times to show that you enjoyed something

sentences.english: The boys were playing a game in the backyard.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在后院里玩游戏。

sentences.english: game birds
sentences.chinese: 被捕猎的鸟

detailed_translations.english: an activity or sport in which people compete with each other according to agreed rules

name: well
trans: adj. 良好的；健康的；适宜的
adv. 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地

sentences.english: Did you sleep well?
sentences.chinese: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.english: James reads quite well for his age.
sentences.chinese: 就詹姆斯的年龄来说，他的阅读能力算不错了。

sentences.english: All the team played very well today.
sentences.chinese: 今天所有队员都打得很不错。

sentences.english: Simon doesn’t work well under pressure.
sentences.chinese: 有压力时西蒙的工作表现就不好。

sentences.english: The festival was very well organized.
sentences.chinese: 节庆活动组织得很好。

sentences.english: The concert went very well.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会进行得非常顺利。

detailed_translations.chinese: 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地
detailed_translations.english: in a successful or satisfactory way
healthy

name: kid
trans: adj. 小山羊皮制的；较年幼的

sentences.english: She’d always loved animals since she was a little kid.
sentences.chinese: 她从小就喜爱动物。

sentences.english: He’s married with three kids.
sentences.chinese: 他已婚，有三个孩子。

sentences.english: A neighbor volunteered to keep an eye on the kids (= their children or the children they are responsible for ).
sentences.chinese: 一位邻居主动来照看这些小孩。

sentences.english: college kids
sentences.chinese: 大学生

detailed_translations.english: a child

name: catch
trans: vt. 赶上；抓住；感染；了解

sentences.english: Did you catch any fish?
sentences.chinese: 你捕到鱼了吗？

sentences.english: Early settlers caught rabbits and squirrels and even rats in order to survive.
sentences.chinese: 早期移民为了生存而捕食野兔、松鼠，甚至老鼠。

sentences.english: I caught the 7.15 train to London.
sentences.chinese: 我赶上了7点15分的火车去伦敦。

sentences.english: Sorry, I didn't quite catch what you said.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我没听清楚你的话。

detailed_translations.english: to trap an animal or fish by using a trap, net, or hook, or by hunting it

sentences.english: Well, she won, of course.
sentences.chinese: 噢，当然是她赢啦。

sentences.english: You should of course keep copies of all your correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 你当然应该保留所有信函的复印件。

sentences.english: Of course there will be some difficult times ahead.
sentences.chinese: 今后当然会有遇到困难的时候。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that other people probably already know what you are saying is true, or expect to hear it

sentences.english: Women usually live longer than men.
sentences.chinese: 女人通常比男人长寿。

sentences.english: Usually I wear black, grey, or brown.
sentences.chinese: 通常我都穿黑色、灰色或者棕色的衣服。

sentences.english: The drive usually takes 15 or 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 这段车程通常需要 15 或 20 分钟。

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about what happens on most occasions or in most situations

sentences.english: Please help us.
sentences.chinese: 请帮助我们。

sentences.english: He arranged for us all to have a drink.
sentences.chinese: 他安排我们大家一起喝一杯。

sentences.english: She’s invited us both.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩她都请了。

sentences.english: My mother is coming to stay with us.
sentences.chinese: 我妈要来和我们同住。

sentences.english: Send us a donation now.
sentences.chinese: 现在就给我们捐款吧。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself and one or more other people

name: ride
trans: n. 骑；乘坐；交通工具；可供骑行的路；（乘坐汽车等的）旅行；乘骑；（乘车或骑车的）短途旅程；供乘骑的游乐设施
vi. 骑马；乘车；依靠；漂浮
vt. 骑；乘；控制；（骑马、自行车等）穿越；搭乘；飘浮

sentences.english: She learned to ride when she was seven.
sentences.chinese: 她七岁时学会了骑马。

sentences.english: He was riding a large grey mare.
sentences.chinese: 他骑着一匹灰色的大母马。

sentences.english: He prefers travelling on the subway to riding in a limousine.
sentences.chinese: 他宁愿乘坐地铁出行而不愿乘坐豪华加长轿车。

sentences.english: She took some friends for a ride in the family car.
sentences.chinese: 她用私家车载了朋友们一程。

detailed_translations.english: to sit on an animal, especially a horse, and make it move along
a trip on a horse or bicycle, or in a vehicle.

name: thing
trans: n. 事情；东西；事物；情况

sentences.english: People say things they don’t mean when they are angry.
sentences.chinese: 人生气时就会口不择言。

sentences.english: It was a horrible thing to happen.
sentences.chinese: 发生这样的事情太糟糕了。

sentences.english: I plan to do all the things I’ve been meaning to do for ages.
sentences.chinese: 我打算去做我多年以来一直想做的事。

sentences.english: The first thing to do is to give them food and shelter.
sentences.chinese: 首要的事是给他们提供食物和住所。

sentences.english: That’s a terrible thing to say .
sentences.chinese: 这话说得太难听了。

sentences.english: Getting more American ideas into British business would be a good thing .
sentences.chinese: 将更多的美国式理念注入英国商界会是一件好事。

sentences.english: ‘I did no such thing ,’ he protested.
sentences.chinese: “我没干过这样的事。”他抗议道。

sentences.english: I know a thing or two (= a lot ) about dogs.
sentences.chinese: 我对狗所知甚详。

sentences.english: In a democracy, it is no bad thing to be able to compromise (= it is good, even though it may not seem good ) .
sentences.chinese: 在民主国家，能够妥协并非就是坏事。

detailed_translations.english: an idea, action, feeling, or fact that someone thinks, does, says, or talks about, or that happens

name: ill
trans: adj. 生病的；坏的；邪恶的；不吉利的
adv. 不利地；恶劣地；几乎不

sentences.english: Bridget can’t come – she’s ill.
sentences.chinese: 布里奇特不能来了，她生病了。

sentences.english: He was unable to join the army because of ill health.
sentences.chinese: 他因为身体不好没法参军。

sentences.english: The animals had been grossly ill-treated.
sentences.chinese: 那些动物受到了恣意虐待。

detailed_translations.english: suffering from a disease or not feeling well
badly or in an unpleasant way

sentences.english: Where did you learn to cook?
sentences.chinese: 你在哪里学烹调的？

sentences.english: Cook the sauce over a low heat for ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把这调味汁用低火烧十分钟。

sentences.english: slices of cooked ham
sentences.chinese: 熟的火腿片

sentences.english: a cooked breakfast
sentences.chinese: 做好的早餐

detailed_translations.english: to prepare food for eating by using heat
to prepare food for eating by using heat

name: her
trans: pron. 她（she的宾格）；她的（she的所有格）；她（指某个国家；一艘船）

sentences.english: Jane? I don’t really know her.
sentences.chinese: 简？我不太认识她。

sentences.english: Margaret wants me to go with her.
sentences.chinese: 玛格丽特想让我和她一起去。

sentences.english: Give her the keys.
sentences.chinese: 把钥匙给她。

sentences.english: Her room was pleasant and airy.
sentences.chinese: 她的房间既舒适又通风。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
belonging to or connected with a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned

sentences.english: I usually go shopping with my aunt.
sentences.chinese: 我通常和我阿姨一起去购物。

name: kitchen
trans: n. 厨房；炊具；炊事人员

sentences.english: Sam went into the kitchen to make a pot of tea.
sentences.chinese: 萨姆走进厨房去沏一壶茶。

sentences.english: She is in the kitchen making a meal.
sentences.chinese: 她在厨房里做饭。

detailed_translations.english: the room where you prepare and cook food

sentences.english: In Japan, a boy plays at a Children's Day event outside the Ishinomori Shotaro Manga Museum.
sentences.chinese: 日本，小男孩正在石卷市章太郎漫画博物馆外过儿童节。

sentences.english: Ignorance was young, had rash juvenile; silent over the years in the fingers, when the Children's Day walk in the street, realized that the past does not look back.
sentences.chinese: 曾经年幼无知，曾经莽撞少年；岁月于指间无声滑过，当儿童节走在街头，才意识到过去的日子不回头。

sentences.english: Drag up a chair and watch the TV.
sentences.chinese: 拖一把椅子坐到前面来看电视。

sentences.english: He threw his homework aside and watched TV.
sentences.chinese: 他把家庭作业抛到一边去看电视了。

sentences.english: He never switched off his TV, which always stayed on.
sentences.chinese: 他从来不关电视机，他的电视机始终开着。

name: play
trans: vt. 游戏；扮演；演奏；播放；同…比赛
vi. 演奏；玩耍；上演；参加比赛

sentences.english: Kids were playing and chasing each other.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在互相追逐嬉闹。

sentences.english: He’s learning to play the piano.
sentences.chinese: 他在学习弹钢琴。

detailed_translations.english: when children play, they do things that they enjoy, often with other people or with toys

name: say
trans: vt. 讲；说明；例如；声称；假设；指明
vi. 讲；表示；念；假定；背诵

sentences.english: ‘I’m so tired,’ she said.
sentences.chinese: “我太累了。”她说。

sentences.english: ‘Don’t cry,’ he said softly.
sentences.chinese: “别哭了。”他柔声说道。

sentences.english: Don’t believe anything he says.
sentences.chinese: 他说什么都不要相信。

sentences.english: I always said I would buy a motorbike when I had enough money.
sentences.chinese: 我一直说等我有了足够的钱就买一辆摩托车。

sentences.english: I would like to say how much we appreciate your hard work.
sentences.chinese: 我想说我们对你的辛勤劳动非常感谢。

sentences.english: ‘Why did she leave?’ ‘I don’t know – she didn’t say .’
sentences.chinese: “她为什么要离开？”“我不知道——她没说。”

sentences.english: Although he didn’t say so , it was clear that he was in pain.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他没说，但是他明显很痛苦。

sentences.english: (= why do you think that ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么会那么说呢？

sentences.english: I’d like to say a few words (= make a short speech ) .
sentences.chinese: 我想简单地说几句。

sentences.english: ‘So what are your plans now?’‘ I’d rather not say .’
sentences.chinese: “那么你现在的计划是什么？”“我还是不说的好。”

detailed_translations.english: to express an idea, feeling, thought etc using words

sentences.english: You need to touch up the poem.
sentences.chinese: 你需要给这首诗润色一下。

sentences.english: The poem was all the rage then.
sentences.chinese: 这首诗在当时十分流行。

sentences.english: His poem compares poorly with yours.
sentences.chinese: 他的诗做得不如你的好。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing that expresses emotions, experiences, and ideas, especially in short lines using words that  rhyme (= end with the same sound )

name: dragon
trans: n. 龙；凶暴的人，凶恶的人；严厉而有警觉性的女人

sentences.english: She worked a dragon on the new linen cloth.
sentences.chinese: 她在新的亚麻布上绣了条龙。

detailed_translations.english: a large imaginary animal that has wings and a long tail and can breathe out fire

name: dragon dance
trans: n. 【文】舞龙；举杆游走；每逢节日庆典都会舞龙助兴

sentences.english: We decided to have a picnic down by the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定在湖边野餐。

sentences.english: a picnic table
sentences.chinese: 野餐桌

sentences.english: There is free parking for visitors, as well as a restaurant and picnic area (= a special area with tables where people can have a picnic ) .
sentences.chinese: 除了餐厅和野餐区，我们还为游客提供免费停车位。

sentences.english: The area is very popular with picnickers.
sentences.chinese: 那个地区很受野餐者的欢迎。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a picnic, you take food and eat it outdoors, especially in the country
to have a picnic

name: family
trans: n. 家庭；亲属；家族；子女；[生]科；语族；[化]族
adj. 家庭的；家族的；适合于全家的

sentences.english: Do you know the family next door?
sentences.chinese: 你认识隔壁那家人吗？

sentences.english: The Webb family still has its farm over there.
sentences.chinese: 韦伯家依然保留着那里的农场。

sentences.english: The family now live in London.
sentences.chinese: 那家人现居伦敦。

sentences.english: This house isn’t big enough for a family of seven.
sentences.chinese: 这房子住不下七口之家。

sentences.english: My family come from Scotland originally.
sentences.chinese: 我祖籍是苏格兰。

detailed_translations.english: a group of people who are related to each other, especially a mother, a father, and their children

sentences.english: a sandy beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩

sentences.english: surfers on the beach
sentences.chinese: 沙滩上的冲浪者

detailed_translations.english: an area of sand or small stones at the edge of the sea or a lake

name: hill
trans: n. 小山；丘陵；斜坡；山冈

sentences.english: Their house is on a hill overlooking the sea.
sentences.chinese: 他们的房子建在可以俯视大海的小山上。

sentences.english: A cart was making its way up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 一辆马车正在爬上山丘。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land that is higher than the land around it, like a mountain but smaller

sentences.english: Judging by her past performance, Jane should do very well.
sentences.chinese: 从以往的表现来看，简应该会干得很好。

sentences.english: From past experience she knew that it was no use arguing with him.
sentences.chinese: 根据过去的经验，她知道和他争论是没有用的。

sentences.english: Study some past exam papers to get an idea of the questions.
sentences.chinese: 仔细看看以前的一些考卷，了解一下考题。

sentences.english: It’s time she stopped living in the past (= thinking only about the past ) and began to think about her future.
sentences.chinese: 她不该再沉湎过去，应开始想想将来。

detailed_translations.english: done, used, or experienced before now
the time that existed before the present

name: station
trans: n. 车站；驻地；地位；身份

sentences.english: I want to get off at the next station.
sentences.chinese: 我要在下一站下车。

sentences.english: Grand Central Station
sentences.chinese: 中央火车站

sentences.english: Is there a waiting room in the station?
sentences.chinese: 车站里有候车室吗？

sentences.english: the city bus station
sentences.chinese: 市内公共汽车站

detailed_translations.english: a place where trains or buses regularly stop so that passengers can get on and off, goods can be loaded etc, or the buildings at such a place
to send someone in the military to a particular place for a period of time as part of their military duty

sentences.english: They are building a new hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在建一家新医院。

detailed_translations.english: a large building where sick or injured people receive medical treatment

name: stop
trans: n. 停止；车站；障碍；逗留
vi. 停止；中止；逗留；被塞住

sentences.english: Stop throwing those stones!
sentences.chinese: 别再扔那些石头了！

detailed_translations.english: to block a hole or pipe so that water, smoke etc cannot go through it
if an activity comes to a stop, it stops happening

name: turn
trans: n. 转弯；变化；(损害或有益于别人的)行为，举动，举止
vt. 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换

sentences.english: Ricky turned and walked away.
sentences.chinese: 里基转身走了。

sentences.english: She turned her head in surprise.
sentences.chinese: 她惊讶地转过头来。

sentences.english: Brigitte glared at him, turned on her heel (= turned away suddenly because of anger ) , and stomped out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 布丽吉特瞪了他一眼，猛地一转身，噔噔噔地走出了房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换
detailed_translations.english: to move your body so that you are looking in a different direction

detailed_translations.chinese: 转弯；变化；(损害或有益于别人的)行为，举动，举止
detailed_translations.english: a sudden or unexpected change that makes a situation develop in a different way

sentences.english: What an inspiration she was to all around her!
sentences.chinese: 她对于她周围所有的人是一种多么大的鼓舞!

sentences.english: All those around him looked at him with amazement.
sentences.chinese: 周围的人都对他投射出惊异的眼光。

name: turn around
trans: na. 转身；〈美〉使向好的方向转变

sentences.english: Bud turned the truck around, and started back for Dalton Pond.
sentences.chinese: 巴德把卡车调了个头，开始返回道尔顿池塘。

sentences.english: He had reached over to turn around a bottle of champagne so that the label didn't show.
sentences.chinese: 他伸过手把一瓶香槟酒转过去，使它的标签显露不出来。

detailed_translations.english: If you turn something around, or if it turns around, it is moved so that it faces the opposite direction

name: ground
trans: n. 地面；土地；范围；战场;根据
v. 研磨（grind的过去分词）；压迫
adj. 土地的；地面上的；磨碎的；磨过的
vt. 使接触地面；打基础；使搁浅

sentences.english: I found her lying on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 我发现她躺在地上。

sentences.english: a football/recreation/sports, etc. ground
sentences.chinese: 足球场、娱乐场地、运动场等

sentences.english: There are strong grounds for believing his statement.
sentences.chinese: 有充分的理由可以相信他的话。

sentences.english: ‘You’re under arrest.’ ‘On what grounds?’
sentences.chinese: “你被捕了。”“理由是什么？”

detailed_translations.english: the solid surface of the earth

name: again
trans: adv. 又，此外；再一次；再说；增加

sentences.english: Can you say that again? I didn’t hear.
sentences.chinese: 你能再说一遍吗？ 我没听见。

sentences.english: I’ll never go there again.
sentences.chinese: 我再也不会去那儿了。

sentences.english: Mr Khan’s busy. Can you try again later?
sentences.chinese: 卡恩先生正忙着。 你能不能过一会儿再打来？

sentences.english: In 1997, the family moved house yet again.
sentences.chinese: 1997年，全家人再一次搬家。

sentences.english: And again, these workshops will benefit the community widely.
sentences.chinese: 再说，这些工作坊会令社区很多人受惠。

detailed_translations.english: one more time – used when something has happened or been done before

name: jump
trans: vt. 跳跃；使跳跃；跳过；突升

sentences.english: The cats jumped down and came to meet us.
sentences.chinese: 这些猫跳下来，过来迎接我们。

detailed_translations.english: to let yourself drop from a place that is above the ground
to let yourself drop from a place that is above the ground

name: back
trans: n. 后面；背部；靠背；足球等的后卫；书报等的末尾
adj. 后面的；过去的；拖欠的
vt. 支持；后退；背书；下赌注
adv. 以前；向后地；来回地；上溯；回来；回原处

sentences.english: I’ll be back in a minute.
sentences.chinese: 我马上回来。

sentences.english: Put that book back where you found it!
sentences.chinese: 把那本书放回原处！

sentences.english: He was back home by half past eleven.
sentences.chinese: 他是11点半之前回家的。

sentences.english: It’s possible to travel there and back in a day.
sentences.chinese: 到那里一天来回是可以的。

sentences.english: Kirov stepped back a pace.
sentences.chinese: 基洛夫往后退了一步。

detailed_translations.english: in, into, or to the place or position where someone or something was before

name: come back
trans: na. 回来；想起来；〔口语〕复原；归

name: left
trans: adj. 左边的；左派的；剩下的
n. 左边；左派；激进分子

sentences.english: She held out her left hand.
sentences.chinese: 她伸出左手。

sentences.english: a scar on the left side of his face
sentences.chinese: 他左脸上的伤疤

detailed_translations.english: your left side is the side of your body that contains your heart

name: right
trans: adj. 正确的；直接的；右方的
adv. 正确地；恰当地；彻底地

sentences.english: Yes, that’s the right answer .
sentences.chinese: 对，回答正确。

sentences.english: Is that the right time ?
sentences.chinese: 那个时间对吗？

sentences.english: I got most of the questions right .
sentences.chinese: 大部分问题我都答对了。

sentences.english: His ideas have now been proved right .
sentences.chinese: 他的观点现已证明是对的。

detailed_translations.english: a statement or piece of information that is right is correct and based on true facts
exactly in a particular position or place
used to check if what you have said is correct
exactly in a particular position or place

name: road
trans: n. 公路，马路；道路；手段

sentences.english: 65 Maple Road
sentences.chinese: 枫树路65号

detailed_translations.english: a specially prepared hard surface for cars, buses, bicycles etc to travel on

name: straight
trans: n. 直；直线；直男，直女，异性恋者
adj. 直的；连续的；笔直的；正直的；整齐的；异性恋的
adv. 直接地；不断地；立即；坦率地

sentences.english: a long, straight road
sentences.chinese: 一条笔直的长路

sentences.english: Try to keep your legs straight.
sentences.chinese: 尽量把腿伸直。

sentences.english: Always lift with a straight back.
sentences.chinese: 提东西的时候，一定要把背挺直。

sentences.english: her long, straight black hair
sentences.chinese: 她又长又直的黑发

sentences.english: They sat down in a straight line .
sentences.chinese: 他们坐成一直溜儿。

sentences.english: The road was dead straight (= completely straight ) .
sentences.chinese: 那条路是笔直的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 直的；连续的；笔直的；正直的；整齐的；异性恋的
detailed_translations.english: something that is straight does not bend or curve

detailed_translations.chinese: 直接地；不断地；立即；坦率地
detailed_translations.english: in a level or correct position

detailed_translations.chinese: 直；直线；直男，直女，异性恋者
detailed_translations.english: the straight part of a  racetrack

name: lost
trans: adj. 失去的；丧失的；迷惑的
v. 遗失（lose的过去分词）；失败

sentences.english: ‘Are you lost?’ the driver asked.
sentences.chinese: “你迷路了吗？”司机问道。

sentences.english: I got thoroughly lost on the way here.
sentences.chinese: 我来这里时完全迷了路。

sentences.english: a lost child
sentences.chinese: 一个走失的孩子

detailed_translations.english: if you are lost, you do not know where you are and are unable to find your way somewhere

name: out
trans: adv. 出现；在外；出局；出声地；不流行地
adj. 外面的；出局的；下台的

sentences.english: She opened her suitcase and took out a pair of shoes.
sentences.chinese: 她打开手提箱，拿出一双鞋。

sentences.english: Lock the door on your way out.
sentences.chinese: 你出去时把门锁上。

sentences.english: Charlotte went to the window and looked out.
sentences.chinese: 夏洛特走到窗前往外看。

sentences.english: Out you go (= used to order someone to leave a room )!
sentences.chinese: 你给我出去！

sentences.english: When the sun came out, a rainbow formed in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 太阳出来时，天空中出现了一道彩虹。

detailed_translations.english: from inside an object, container, building, or place

name: factory
trans: n. 工厂；制造厂；代理店

sentences.english: a car factory
sentences.chinese: 汽车制造厂

sentences.english: factory workers
sentences.chinese: 工厂工人

detailed_translations.english: a building or group of buildings in which goods are produced in large quantities, using machines

name: next to
trans: prep. 紧邻；在…近旁；仅次于；紧接

sentences.english: There was a little girl sitting next to him.
sentences.chinese: 有个小女孩坐在他旁边。

detailed_translations.english: very close to someone or something, with no other person, building place, etc in between

name: cousin
trans: n. 堂兄弟姊妹；表兄弟姊妹

sentences.english: My cousin Mark helped me to bring in the bags.
sentences.chinese: 我表弟马克帮我把包提了进来。

detailed_translations.english: the child of your uncle or aunt

name: supermarket
trans: n. 超级市场；自助售货商店

sentences.english: His eyes roved round the supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 他的眼睛环视了一下超级市场。

sentences.english: The whole supermarket was ruined in a great fire.
sentences.chinese: 整个超级市场被一场大火烧掉。

sentences.english: The supermarket near our school will be reopened soon.
sentences.chinese: 我们学校附近的那个超级市场不久将重新开业。

detailed_translations.english: a very large shop that sells food, drinks, and things that people need regularly in their homes

name: wrong
trans: adj. 错误的；失常的；不适当的
vt. 委屈；无理地对待；诽谤
adv. 错误地；邪恶地，不正当地

sentences.english: You’ve spelt my name wrong.
sentences.chinese: 你把我的名字拼错了。

sentences.english: What? Have I done it wrong ?
sentences.chinese: 什么？我做得不对吗？

sentences.english: I asked him to sort those files, but he’s done it all wrong (= in completely the wrong way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我让他整理这些文件，可是他弄得根本不对。

sentences.english: I must have added it up wrong, then.
sentences.chinese: 那我一定是加错了。

sentences.english: It looks like it's spelled wrong.
sentences.chinese: 看起来像是拼错了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误地；邪恶地，不正当地
detailed_translations.english: not in the correct way
behaviour that is not morally right

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误的；失常的；不适当的
detailed_translations.english: not correct, and not based on true facts
Wrong is also an adverb

name: way
trans: n. 方法；道路；方向；行业；习惯

sentences.english: My family was in a bad way financially.
sentences.chinese: 我家当时经济窘迫。

sentences.english: The chicken’s nice and crispy – just the way I like it.
sentences.chinese: 这鸡肉很脆，正是我喜欢的口味。

sentences.english: It’s worth thinking how you can improve the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 你应该想想如何让现状变得更好。

detailed_translations.english: a particular state or condition

sentences.english: Two of his front teeth had been knocked out.
sentences.chinese: 他有两颗门牙被打落了。

sentences.english: the front cover of ‘Hello!’ magazine
sentences.chinese: 《Hello!》杂志的封面

sentences.english: the front wheel of his bicycle
sentences.chinese: 他自行车的前轮

sentences.english: the dog’s front legs
sentences.chinese: 狗的前腿

sentences.english: Ricky stepped forward to the front of the stage and began to sing.
sentences.chinese: 里基走到舞台的最前面，开始唱了起来。

detailed_translations.english: at, on, or in the front of something
the part of something that is furthest forward in the direction that it is facing or moving

sentences.english: I'll not want to say in front of the reporters.
sentences.chinese: 我不愿在记者面前谈论我的观点。

sentences.english: She spent hours in front of the mirror, combing through her long hair.
sentences.chinese: 她在镜子前花费好几个钟头梳理她的长发。

name: well
trans: adj. 良好的；健康的；适宜的
adv. 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地

sentences.english: Did you sleep well?
sentences.chinese: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.english: James reads quite well for his age.
sentences.chinese: 就詹姆斯的年龄来说，他的阅读能力算不错了。

sentences.english: All the team played very well today.
sentences.chinese: 今天所有队员都打得很不错。

sentences.english: Simon doesn’t work well under pressure.
sentences.chinese: 有压力时西蒙的工作表现就不好。

sentences.english: The festival was very well organized.
sentences.chinese: 节庆活动组织得很好。

sentences.english: The concert went very well.
sentences.chinese: 音乐会进行得非常顺利。

detailed_translations.chinese: 很好地；充分地；满意地；适当地
detailed_translations.english: in a successful or satisfactory way
healthy

name: taxi
trans: vt. 使滑行；用出租车送

sentences.english: The plane taxied to a halt.
sentences.chinese: 飞机滑行一段距离后停下来。

detailed_translations.english: if a plane taxis, it moves along the ground before taking off or after landing
a car and driver that you pay to take you somewhere

name: Mrs
trans: n. 太太；夫人（用于已婚妇女姓名前的尊称）

sentences.english: It is said that Mrs White rules her husband strictly.
sentences.chinese: 据说怀特夫人对她的丈夫管得很严。

sentences.english: Mr Brown and Mrs Smith have been carrying on for some months now.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生和史密斯太太发生暧昧关系已经好几个月了。

sentences.english: He hitched his chair to me and told the secrets about Mrs Johnson.
sentences.chinese: 他把椅子向我身边挪了挪，然后把约翰逊夫人的秘密告诉了我。

name: cinema
trans: n. 电影；电影院；电影业，电影制作术

sentences.english: It’s on at the local cinema.
sentences.chinese: 此片正在当地影院上映。

detailed_translations.english: a building in which films are shown
